## Bird Counts
  
Not huge numbers, but certainly more than were caught on camera last year - almost all were Barn Owl(s), although I think we caught a few  Swallows. The owl in particular seems to have been active during November.


```{r echo = FALSE, out.width='100%'}

library(knitr)
File_In <<- (paste(params$Data_Folder,params$Rpt_Month," ",params$Rpt_Year,"/","Chart_Category_Bar_",params$Rpt_Year,"_YTD__Bird.jpg",sep=""))

knitr::include_graphics(File_In)
```
